page.title: 17Schools in Codnor
page.content: Children have the opportunity to begin their education at the age of three by attending the{playgroup}in Peveril House or the{nursery unit}of the Infant School. At five, they move to the{Infant {School}(head Miss S.Taylor) .There are 4 teachers, 2 welfare and 1 clerical assistants and 2 cleaners. The{Junior School}(head,Mr.A.Morgan) has 135 pupils,5 teachers,clerical and welfare assistants,caretaker,cleaning and kitchen staff and lunchtime supervisors. The lessons are varied and interesting: maths,Enlish,science, environmental studies,PE,RE,music,art. There is a craft/science room where the two computers and colour TV are kept as additional aids to learning. At eleven, children move to Aldercar or Ripley Mill Hill secondary schools. {CR/IDS
